error.title: Login Error
error.description: An error occurred while trying to login. Please try again.
error.unauthorized: You don't have permission to access the admin panel.
error.noAuthUrl: No authorization URL received from server

authorizedAdmins.title: Authorized Admins
authorizedAdmins.subtitle: Manage pre-authorized emails for automatic admin promotion

info.description: When a user signs in via Google OAuth with an email listed here, they will automatically be promoted to the admin role. This works for both new users and existing users.

addEmail.title: Add Authorized Admin
addEmail.description: Add an email address to the list of pre-authorized admins. Users with this email will be automatically promoted to admin on login.

removeConfirm.title: Remove Authorized Admin
removeConfirm.description: Are you sure you want to remove this email from the authorized admins list? This will not affect existing users with this email.

deleteConfirm.title: Delete Record
deleteConfirm.description: Are you sure you want to delete this record? This action cannot be undone.

card.title: API Keys
card.description: These keys are used to authenticate API requests. Keep them secure.

generate.title: Generate New API Key
generate.descriptionBefore: Create a new API key for authenticating requests. Only one active key per platform is allowed.
generate.descriptionAfter: Your API key has been generated. Copy it now - you won't be able to see it again!
generate.alertDescription: Make sure to copy your API key now. You won't be able to see it again!

regenerate.title: Regenerate API Key
regenerate.descriptionBefore: This will generate a new key and invalidate the old one. This action cannot be undone.
regenerate.descriptionAfter: Your API key has been regenerated. Copy it now - you won't be able to see it again!
regenerate.alertDescription: The old key has been invalidated. Make sure to update all services using this key.

revoke.title: Revoke API Key
revoke.description: This will permanently revoke this API key. All requests using this key will fail. This action cannot be undone.

messages.noKeys: No API keys found. Generate one to get started.

usersByRole.title: Users by Role
usersByRole.description: Breakdown of user roles in the system

collectionBuilder.title: Collection Builder
collectionBuilder.subtitle: Create and manage custom database collections

emptyState.title: No custom collections yet
emptyState.description: Create your first collection to get started

delete.title: Delete Collection
delete.description: Are you sure you want to delete this collection schema? This action cannot be undone. Existing data will be preserved but inaccessible.

messages.superadminOnly: Collection Builder is only available to superadmin users.
messages.collectionNotFoundDescription: The collection you are looking for does not exist.

placeholder.title: Visual Designer Coming Soon
placeholder.description: The drag-and-drop collection builder interface is being developed. This will allow you to visually design database schemas.

basicInfo.title: Basic Information
basicInfo.description: Define your collection name and metadata

fields.title: Fields
fields.description: Define the fields for your collection

indexes.title: Indexes (Optional)
indexes.description: Add database indexes for better query performance

displayName.label: Display Name
displayName.help: Human-readable name (e.g., Blog Posts, User Profiles)

description.label: Description (Optional)
description.placeholder: Describe what this collection is for

fieldsTable.search: Search fields by name, label, or type...

indexes.emptyState: No indexes added. Indexes can improve query performance.

fieldsToIndex.label: Fields to Index
fieldsToIndex.help: Select two fields to create a composite index

success.created: Collection created successfully! Server is restarting to apply migrations...

removeField.title: Remove Field
removeField.description: Are you sure you want to remove the field "{fieldName}"? This action cannot be undone.

devMode.title: Development Only Feature
devMode.description: The Collection Builder is only available in development mode. This feature is not accessible in production environments.

collectionDetail.fieldsDescription: Manage collection fields and their configuration

deleteFieldDialog.title: Delete Field
deleteFieldDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete "{fieldName}"? This action cannot be undone.

editCollectionModal.title: Edit Collection: {name}
editCollectionModal.description: Update collection metadata and manage indexes.
editCollectionModal.iconHelp: Lucide icon name (e.g., Database, User, FileText)
editCollectionModal.indexesDescription: Create composite indexes to improve query performance
editCollectionModal.indexChangesDescription: Adding or modifying indexes will generate a new migration. Review and apply carefully.

validation.nameAndLabelRequired: Field name and label are required
validation.duplicateName: Field name "{name}" already exists. Please use a unique name.

devReset.title: Development Reset
devReset.subtitle: Reset the database to start fresh with the setup wizard

warning.title: Warning: Destructive Action
warning.description: This will permanently delete all data from the database including:

card.title: Reset Database
card.description: This action will clear all data and reset the setup wizard. You will need to go through the initial setup process again.

resetting.title: Resetting...
resetting.description: Database is being reset. You will be logged out and redirected to the login page.

devOnly.title: Development Only
devOnly.description: This page is only available when NODE_ENV=development. It will not be accessible in production.

accessDenied.title: Access Denied
accessDenied.description: This page is only available in development mode.

messages.confirmAction: Are you absolutely sure? This action cannot be undone.
messages.noToken: No access token found. Please login first.

setup.title: Welcome to Fastify OAuth API
setup.subtitle: Let's set up your admin account

steps.login: Login with your Google or Apple account
steps.apiKeysGenerated: API keys will be generated automatically
steps.panelRestart: Admin panel will restart with new configuration

setup.agreement: By continuing, you agree to become the system administrator

errors.failedGoogleOAuth: Failed to generate Google OAuth URL
errors.failedAppleOAuth: Failed to generate Apple OAuth URL
errors.failedRedirect: Failed to redirect to admin panel

errors.failedProcessLinking: Failed to process account linking request
errors.accessDenied: Access denied. Only administrators can access this panel.

setupApiKeys.title: Setup Complete!
setupApiKeys.subtitle: Your API keys have been generated

warning.title: Important: Save These Keys Now
warning.description: These keys are shown only once. Copy and save them before closing this window.

web.title: Web API Key
web.description: Store this key in your website configuration (frontend or backend).

ios.title: iOS API Key
ios.description: Store this key in your iOS mobile app configuration.

android.title: Android API Key
android.description: Store this key in your Android mobile app configuration.

setupApiKeys.confirmation: I have saved all API keys (Web, iOS, Android). I understand these keys won't be shown again.

nextSteps.title: Next steps:
nextSteps.loginOAuth: Login with your OAuth account to access the dashboard
nextSteps.addAdmins: Add more authorized admins from the admin panel
nextSteps.configureWeb: Configure your website with the Web API key
nextSteps.configureMobile: Configure your mobile apps with the iOS/Android keys

linkProvider.title: Link {provider} Account?
linkProvider.subtitle: We found an existing account with this email address
linkProvider.infoAlert: Linking this {provider} account will allow you to sign in using either provider. Your existing data will be preserved.

metadata.rootDescription: Admin panel for Fastify OAuth API

columnSelector.title: Select Visible Columns
columnSelector.description: Choose which columns to display in the table. Changes apply globally for all admins.

editRecord.title: Edit Record
editRecord.description: Make changes to the record. Protected fields (ID, timestamps) are hidden.
editRecord.confirmDescription: Are you sure you want to save these changes? This action will update the record in the database.

messages.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete?
